objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#1A1A1A'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#232323'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#2A2A2A'/><rect x='0' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#111111'/><rect x='540' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#DB0A13' opacity='0.9'/><g opacity='0.1'><path d='M0 140 L1080 140' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M0 280 L1080 280' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M0 420 L1080 420' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M0 560 L1080 560' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M0 700 L1080 700' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M0 840 L1080 840' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M0 980 L1080 980' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M140 0 L140 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M280 0 L280 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M420 0 L420 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M560 0 L560 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M700 0 L700 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M840 0 L840 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M980 0 L980 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/></g><circle cx='120' cy='300' r='40' fill='#DB0A13' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='920' cy='160' r='60' fill='#DB0A13' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M540 0 L540 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M0 540 L1080 540' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.2'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#gradient)'/><defs><linearGradient id='gradient' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1080' y2='1080' gradientUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><stop offset='0' stop-color='#000000' stop-opacity='0.1'/><stop offset='1' stop-color='#000000' stop-opacity='0.3'/></linearGradient></defs></svg>

objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Advanced 77-Point AF System
• Real-Time Electronic Viewfinder
• Full HD 1080p Video Recording

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Simple
product_details.description:
• Classic retro design with modern digital technology
• High-performance 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II sensor for exceptional image quality
• Advanced autofocus system with 77 selectable AF points
• Real-time electronic viewfinder with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Tiltable 3-inch LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Built-in Wi-Fi for instant photo sharing and remote control
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens system
• Compact and lightweight body perfect for travel photography
• Multiple customizable function buttons for quick access to settings
• Film simulation modes to recreate classic Fujifilm looks
• Weather-sealed construction for durability

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and tech-savvy layout suited for promoting a digital product. The design is structured with a dark geometric background filled with fine white grid lines and subtle decorative circles, creating a high-tech and sophisticated look. A large product image occupies the right half, while the left section is used for text content. The text layer with id `heading` presents the brand name in bold white, followed by the `subheading` in vibrant red for strong contrast. Below it, the `tagline` and `subtitle` provide additional context in lighter tones. Product features are listed using the `description` layer. The `price` is prominently displayed in bold, with a striking red `cta_background` rectangle beneath it containing the white `cta` text. A narrow red `decorative_accent` runs vertically down the left edge for emphasis.

**Color Palette:**
- Black: #000000 (background/grid)
- Dark Gray Shades: #1A1A1A, #232323, #2A2A2A, #111111
- Red: #DB0A13 (subheading, CTA button, and accents)
- White: #FFFFFF (text and UI elements)
- Light Gray: #CCCCCC (tagline, subtitle)
product_color: The product image of the Fujifilm X-T10 camera features a sleek, professional color palette dominated by matte and gloss textures in dark shades. The primary color is a deep charcoal black (#1C1C1C), contrasted by highlights of gunmetal grey (#3E3E3E) on the body and lens rings. Accents in metallic silver (#C0C0C0) are used for text and dials, creating sharp contrasts. Subtle red (#D12E2E) and orange (#F28B28) touches on lens markings provide visual interest without overpowering the design. The lens glass adds a soft greenish hue (#A6C8A8), subtly enriching the overall monochrome scheme. This palette evokes modernity, precision, and sophistication, ideal for premium advertisement visuals.
